name: MARTEC360
description:
As the convergence of Marketing and Technology is happening, many established e-Businesses & e-Commerce companies are maturing and demanding leading technology and marketing solutions to deal with legacy systems that have plateaued them out or are affecting their ability to compete effectively.
MARTEC360 offers a suite of Marketing, Technology & Business strategies, solutions and services proven to drive bottom-line growth and profitability. Designed to encompass the full 360 degree needs of our clients. Delivered by seasoned, experienced partners and our dedicated team of solution experts.
MARTEC360 creates holistic, data-driven marketing solutions that focus on increasing the clients “bottom line” (ROI/ROAS) in the following areas:
Holistic SEO/SEM Strategy, Consulting & Execution
Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
Pay Per Click (PPC) Management
Content Strategy
Technical Analysis & Optimization
Conversion Optimization and Tracking
Programmatic (AI) Shopping Management
Comprehensive eCommerce RevGrowth Strategies
